(I no the whole Jason Lind thing is cleared, but it's obvious Jason 
that you're Dark Hero. You and him usually post minutes apart, and 
when you can't post, by a magical coincidence he can't post either.)

Vulois

Vulois looks at Windrazor and Terradive.

"This is what I like to call the "nerve center of the mountain. Eight 
different tunnels to go through. One leads to my lair, seven will 
lead deeper and deeper into the mountain with twists and turns that 
you won't remember your way back, and the last one leads to a giant 
lake of Alligators. We have a 1/8 chance that we will end up in the 
right one. But I think this is the one. Follow me."

Vulois heads down one of the tunnels.
______________________________________________________________________
Fliq

Fliq leads Ramulus to the hull around the  mid-section.

"Okay, this should do. Let's wait for Brix."
______________________________________________________________________
Brix

Brix walks into the storage room and finds a box full of tools.

"I'm sure it's in here somewhere. I'll just take the box."

Just than Brix thought he heard the sound of footsteps.

"Huh? Wha? Forget it. My imagination."

Brix heads down to where Fliq and Ramulus are, but the sound still 
follows....
(Ooh! Spooky.)
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream heres the yelling of words between KitKat and Testifyer. 
He runs out of his room and does a flip over Testifyer's head, 
pulling out his two blasters in the process. He landed, turned around 
and put them against Testifyer's head.

"Do that again, and so help me Matrix I'l blow your f'n head off."
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

Gotron saw that Reptillica was handling it, and went back to his post.
______________________________________________________________________
Zava

Zava watched as Deemos made plans.

"What?!? No Destruction! Please tell me it's the back-up plan!"
